How to Get Voter Data in Mississippi

November 17, 2025 mississippi voter-data voter-list voter-history

Mississippi provides free access to voter registration data and voter history through a weekly email distribution program. After submitting a simple online form, approved requestors receive weekly emails with download links to current voter files.

Quick Summary

Category Details
Statewide Cost Free
Voter List Access Weekly email distribution
Voter History Access Included in weekly email
Delivery Method Email with CSV download link
Processing Time Weekly updates
Update Frequency Weekly

Voter List

Mississippi distributes voter registration data through a weekly email program managed by the Secretary of State’s office.

How to Access

  1. Review the 2025 Voter File Weekly Distribution Program details
  2. Complete the online signup form
  3. Submit your information to be added to the distribution list
  4. Receive weekly emails with download links to CSV files

What’s Included

The voter registration file includes comprehensive information for all registered voters in Mississippi.

Voter History

Mississippi includes voter history data in the weekly email distribution along with the voter registration list.

Historical Coverage

Voter history files are provided as part of the weekly data distribution, giving subscribers access to current participation records.

Cost

Mississippi’s voter data appears to be completely free. No fee is mentioned for joining the weekly distribution program.

Update Frequency

The program provides weekly updates, ensuring subscribers have access to current voter registration data throughout the year.

Restrictions and Permitted Uses

When accessing Mississippi voter data, users must comply with state laws regarding the use of voter registration records. Review the program documentation for specific terms of use and legal requirements.

Technical Notes

Distribution Method

Mississippi uses an automated email system to distribute weekly voter file updates to approved subscribers.

File Format

Data is provided as CSV files accessible via download links in the weekly emails.

Testing Status

The signup form has been submitted to test the system. The weekly email distribution model should provide regular access to updated voter data once approved.

Mississippi’s free weekly voter data distribution program offers an excellent balance of accessibility and currency. Regular weekly updates ensure subscribers always have access to current voter registration and history information at no cost.
